email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. She’s a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. I’m quoting a freight rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Given the current market, I was hoping for something closer to $49.50 per metric ton. Also, could you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position on the freight rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $50.00 per metric ton, which is quite competitive given the vessel’s specifications. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $50.00 per metric ton is acceptable. However, could we negotiate the demurrage rate down to $22,000 per day? Also, please confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, glad to hear the freight rate works for you. I’ve confirmed with the owner, and we can agree to $22,000 per day for demurrage. The laycan remains 15-20 October. If everything looks good, I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Let me know if there’s anything else. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good on my end. Please proceed with drafting the charter party agreement. Thanks for your help in finalizing this deal. Looking forward to working with you. Cheers, John
